name: Rock, Paper, Crusader!
description:
Made for Mini Jam 98: Empty.

You are the sole new transfer unit heading to a faraway land for one purpose: cleansing the land of the husk menace.

Go! Use your specialised techniques and fulfil your purpose!

Features:

- Fast-paced rock-paper-scissors gameplay!

- Nice-to-look-at simple graphics!

- All you can beat horde of soulless husks!
